titleStmt.title: Graphautarkeia, or, The Scriptures sufficiency practically demonstrated wherein whatsoever is contain'd in Scripture, respecting doctrine, worship or manners is reduced to its proper head, weighty cases resolved, truths confirmed, difficult texts illustrated and explained by others more plain.

Graphautarkeia, or, The Scriptures sufficiency practically demonstrated wherein whatsoever is contain'd in Scripture, respecting doctrine, worship or manners is reduced to its proper head, weighty cases resolved, truths confirmed, difficult texts illustrated and explained by others more plain.
titleStmt.author: Locke, John, 1632-1704.

notesStmt.note: Attribution doubtful. Sometimes ascribed to John Locke. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
